newUser.subject: Welcome to RemoCare
newUser.text:
Hello, Dear Caregiver

A new RemoCare site({{deviceName}}) is registered at RemoCare with this email.

Please click this link ({{loginLink}}) to log in and manage your account.

Your log in email: {{email}}

Your password: {{password}}

Please set your own password right away upon your first log-in.

For more information, please contact us at info@remotron.com.

RemoCare Team
